name: Break The Targets Alpha_1
description:
Break the Targets! 

How many shots does it take to break all the targets? Let us know in the comments! 

Please fill out our survey to give us your thoughts and support! 

https://forms.gle/yPv4TxeBQ4CrGfpM8

Please consider donating to help us achieve our dreams!

https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-us-fulfil-our-dream?utm_source=customer&utm_medi...

Controls:

Space-bar: Fire

Mouse right-click: Pan screen

Mouse left-click: Aim gun

Mouse scroll wheel: Zoom in and out

Left-click on the gun to move it up and down across the track.

** If you are having trouble seeing the full game, please click the full-screen button.
